title: The one right time to say "all me"
body:
when you show up to a fight at the last second and last-hit.

I APOLOGIZE FOR NOTHING!

Go ahead. Try it on your favorite supp. It feels so wrong... and so right, all at the same time...

replies.body: I agree. It's no fun nuking someone and then someone else getting the kill, then saying all me. Like gosh, everyone knows the person that {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}}  for the kill did all the work, especially since {{champion:238}} deathmark was about to go off, do you know how much work it takes to secure that kill?
Yes. I know exactly how much work it takes: one last-hit... Must... RESIST... _TEMPTATIO_ - screw it I'm doing it, \*last-hits\* "All me."
